config.ichunutil.cat.general.name: General Options
config.ichunutil.cat.gameplay.name: Gameplay
config.ichunutil.cat.global.name: Global Options
config.ichunutil.cat.serverOnly.name: Server Options
config.ichunutil.cat.clientOnly.name: Client Only
config.ichunutil.cat.block.name: Block
config.ichunutil.cat.general.desc: These options are general options that don't fit any other category.
config.ichunutil.cat.gameplay.desc: These options affect the gameplay while using the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.global.desc: These options affect both servers and clients that load the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.serverOnly.desc: These options affect only the server that loads the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.clientOnly.desc: These options affect only the client that loads the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.block.desc: These options affect the blocks in the mod.
config.ichunutil.prop.easterEgg.name: Client Easter Eggs
config.ichunutil.prop.easterEgg.desc: Enables Client-Side Easter Eggs for iChun's Mods
Renders iChunUtil's GUIs in a Minecraft Style instead
config.ichunutil.prop.guiDockPadding.des: How much padding to add to the docked windows
config.ichunutil.prop.guiTooltipCooldown: Number of ticks before showing a tooltip
gui.ichunutil.configs.title: Config Editor
